original_text: Only two men who had gone to explore the land did not die. They were Joshua, the son of Nun, and Caleb, the son of Jephunneh.
korean_text: 그 땅을 정탐하러 갔던 사람들 중에서 오직 눈의 아들 여호수아와 여분네의 아들 갈렙은 생존하니라

sentences.original_text: Only two men who had gone to explore the land
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 그 땅을 탐지하러 갔던 두 사람만이

sentences.original_text: They were Joshua, the son of Nun,
and Caleb, the son of Jephunneh
